casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Linwood Earl FORTE. No. 20A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 23, 2005. William N. Farrell, Senior Deputy Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of March 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Forte) shall have up to and including the 30th day of June 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of March 2005."
